attributes.action: my human right to abode in UK with my family
attributes.additional_details: My mother was from Liverpool and my father a U.S.serviceman.I have lived in liverpool for over 30 years.My father retired from the airforce and moved the family to Liverpool in 1976 I have 3 British sons and 2 Grandsons  that all reside in Liverpool  along with my 2 sisters and my brother.Unfortunately I broke the law and did time in Jail in England and was deported after a long ordeal with the UKBA which lasted 3 an a half years of court cases.I am now residing in Charlotte North Carolina which is where they deported me to.I have no family in the USA and all my loved ones are in Liverpool.I did my time in Jail in England and paid my debt to society and just want to be back home with my only family.I moved to Sweden for a year last year to be close to my loved ones and tried to fly into Liverpool airport July just gone.I got a solicitor from a detention center in Scotland and she was trying to get the deportation order revoked on humanitarian grounds.
